00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct List *list, *cell;
00028  
00029     adfEnvInitDefault();
00030 
00031     /* create and mount one device */
00032     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00033     if (!hd) {
00034         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00035         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00036     }
00037 
00038     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00039         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00040         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00041         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00042     }
00043 
00044     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00045     if (!vol) {
00046         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00047         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00048         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00052 
00053     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00054 
00055 
00056     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00057     while(cell) {
00058         printEntry(cell->content);
00059         cell = cell->next;
00060     }
00061     adfFreeDirList(list);
00062 
00063     putchar('\n');
00064 
00065     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00066 
00067     adfCreateDir(vol,883,"dir_51");
00068 
00069     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"toto");
00070 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",vol->curDirPtr);
00071     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00072     while(cell) {
00073         printEntry(cell->content);
00074         cell = cell->next;
00075     }
00076     adfFreeDirList(list);
00077 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",883L);
00078     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,883);
00079     while(cell) {
00080         printEntry(cell->content);
00081         cell = cell->next;
00082     }
00083     adfFreeDirList(list);
00084 
00085     adfRenameEntry(vol, 883,"dir_51", vol->curDirPtr,"dir_55");
00086 putchar('\n');
00087 
00088 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",vol->curDirPtr);
00089     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00090     while(cell) {
00091         printEntry(cell->content);
00092         cell = cell->next;
00093     }
00094     adfFreeDirList(list);
00095 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",883L);
00096     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,883);
00097     while(cell) {
00098         printEntry(cell->content);
00099         cell = cell->next;
00100     }
00101     adfFreeDirList(list);
00102 
00103     adfRenameEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr,"toto", 883,"moved_dir");
00104 
00105 putchar('\n');
00106 
00107 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",vol->curDirPtr);
00108     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00109     while(cell) {
00110         printEntry(cell->content);
00111         cell = cell->next;
00112     }
00113     adfFreeDirList(list);
00114 printf("[dir = %ld]\n",883L);
00115     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,883);
00116     while(cell) {
00117         printEntry(cell->content);
00118         cell = cell->next;
00119     }
00120     adfFreeDirList(list);
00121 
00122         adfUnMount(vol);
00123     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00124 
00125     adfEnvCleanUp();
00126 
00127     return 0;
